name: Odd.neg_zpow
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DivisionRing α
n : Int
h : Odd n
a : α
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow (Neg.neg a) n) (Neg.neg (HPow.hPow a n))
decl:
theorem Odd.neg_zpow (h : Odd n) (a : α) : (-a) ^ n = -a ^ n := by
  have hn : n ≠ 0 := by rintro rfl; exact Int.not_even_iff_odd.2 h .zero
  obtain ⟨k, rfl⟩ := h
  simp_rw [zpow_add' (.inr (.inl hn)), zpow_one, zpow_mul, zpow_two, neg_mul_neg,
    neg_mul_eq_mul_neg]

name: Odd.neg_one_zpow
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DivisionRing α
n : Int
h : Odd n
⊢ Eq (HPow.hPow (-1) n) (-1)
decl: theorem Odd.neg_one_zpow (h : Odd n) : (-1 : α) ^ n = -1 := by rw [h.neg_zpow, one_zpow]
